scripts.dist: npm run dist:bowerify & npm run dist:bowerify.min & npm run dist:commonjs & wait
scripts.dist:bowerify: NODE_ENV=dev        browserify src/kefir.combines.js -t babelify --no-bundle-external -d -s kefir.combines -g envify                               > dist/kefir.combines.js
scripts.dist:bowerify.min: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/kefir.combines.js -t babelify --no-bundle-external    -s kefir.combines -g envify -g uglifyify | uglifyjs -m -c > dist/kefir.combines.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run dist
